TestTool.Model.TestGrading

Class QuestionScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestTool.Model.QuestionCreation.Question
      • TestTool.Model.TestGrading.QuestionScore

  • public abstract class QuestionScore
extends Question
    QuestionScore keeps track of the Student's score per question. The QuestionScore contains a Question, to associate a score to a specific question. The QuestionScore class will be used inside the TestScore class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String feedback
      A string that holds the feedback for a question.
      (package private) boolean isGraded
      A boolean that determines if the question has been assigned pointsEarned.
      (package private) double pointsEarned
      The number of points that the Student earned for the Question.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestionScore()

      Sets the feedback for the QuestionScore.
      (package private) abstract void clearFeedback()
      Clears the feedback for the QuestionScore.
      (package private) abstract void editFeedback(java.lang.String feedback)
      Edits the feedback for the QuestionScore.
      (package private) abstract java.lang.String getFeedback()
      Retrieves the feedback for the QuestionScore.
      (package private) abstract int getPointsEarned()
      Retrieves the number of points earned on a Question.
      (package private) abstract void setGraded()
      Sets the QuestionScore's boolean to true.
      (package private) abstract void setPointsEarned(int points)
      Updates the points that the Student earned for the Question.

    • Field Detail

      • pointsEarned

        double pointsEarned
        The number of points that the Student earned for the Question. Will be initialized to -1.

      • feedback

        java.lang.String feedback
        A string that holds the feedback for a question.

      • isGraded

        boolean isGraded
        A boolean that determines if the question has been assigned pointsEarned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuestionScore

        public QuestionScore()

    • Method Detail

      • setPointsEarned

        abstract void setPointsEarned(int points)
        Updates the points that the Student earned for the Question. The pointsEarned must be less than or equal to the number of pointsPossible. This number cannot be less than 0.
        Parameters:
        points - The number of points earned. pre: points >= 0 && points < this.points; post: this.pointsEarned = points;

      • getPointsEarned

        abstract int getPointsEarned()
        Retrieves the number of points earned on a Question. If the pointsEarned has not been set, this method will return -1.
        Returns:
        The number of points earned. pre: NONE; post: (if (this.pointsEarned >= 0) return == -1) && (if (this.pointsEarned < 0) return == this.pointsEarned);

      • addFeedback

        abstract void addFeedback(java.lang.String feedback)
        Sets the feedback for the QuestionScore.
        Parameters:
        feedback - The feedback to be associated with the QuestionScore. pre: NONE; post: this.feedback = feedback;

      • getFeedback

        abstract java.lang.String getFeedback()
        Retrieves the feedback for the QuestionScore. If feedback has not been set, this method will return null.
        Returns:
        The current feedback.

      • editFeedback

        abstract void editFeedback(java.lang.String feedback)
        Edits the feedback for the QuestionScore. This method will make use of the getFeedback method to first retrieve the current feedback, then update it with the new feedback.
        Parameters:
        feedback - The updated feedback.

      • clearFeedback

        abstract void clearFeedback()
        Clears the feedback for the QuestionScore.

      • setGraded

        abstract void setGraded()
        Sets the QuestionScore's boolean to true. This method will be called when setPointsEarned is called.
